Usage¶

Installation¶

To install the CompE560 Simple Terminal, first install the requirements using pip.

$ pip install -r requirements.txt

Then have fun and run the code! First start a server in one terminal and then a client in another.

$ python3 server.py

$ python3 client.py

CompE560 Simple Terminal
